item.description:
The Strand Theater in Clinton is showing their Summer Movie Classics. The schedule is below. All shows start at 7:00. Let's meet outside the theater at 6:30. If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

 

July 11 - Jaws

July 18 - Breakfast at Tiffany's

July 25 - National Velvet

August 1 - Ferris Bueller's Day Off

August 8 - The Sting

August 15 - On Golden Pond

August 22 - Monty Python & The Holy Grail
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo, but with a goatee

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Movie Classics: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
